404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Return to Next Tools homepage to find the developer tools you need.
404.maybe: Maybe the cache is doing tricky things, try force-refreshing?
404.sorry: Sorry, this page does not seem to exist
404.title: 404 Not Found - Next Tools

about.content:
# About Next-Tools
Next-Tools is a collection of practical online tools designed for developers and IT professionals. This project is a fork and enhancement of the original [it-tools](https://github.com/CorentinTh/it-tools) project, rebuilt and maintained by [Will Jay](https://github.com/willjayyyy).

Our mission is to provide developers with efficient, reliable tools that streamline daily workflows. Whether you're working on data conversion, text processing, or network analysis, Next-Tools offers a clean, intuitive interface to get the job done quickly.

## What Makes Next-Tools Special
- **Open Source**: Licensed under GPL-3.0, free and transparent
- **Developer Focused**: Built by developers, for developers
- **Privacy First**: All tools run locally in your browser
- **Regular Updates**: Continuous improvements and new tool additions

## Technologies
Next-Tools is built with modern web technologies:
- **Vue.js 3** - Progressive JavaScript framework
- **Naive UI** - Vue 3 component library
- **Vite** - Fast build tool and development server
- **TypeScript** - Type-safe development

We also leverage various open-source libraries for specific functionality. You can find the complete list in our [package.json](https://github.com/willjayyyy/next-tools/blob/main/package.json).

## Community & Contributions
We believe in the power of open-source collaboration. If you have ideas for new tools or improvements, we'd love to hear from you! Feel free to:
- ‚≠ê Star the repository if you find it useful
- üêõ Report bugs or issues
- üí° Suggest new tools or features
- ü§ù Contribute code improvements

## Found a bug? Need a new tool?
We actively maintain this project and welcome your feedback. Please visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/willjayyyy/next-tools) to:
- Submit feature requests via [Issues](https://github.com/willjayyyy/next-tools/issues/new/choose)
- Report bugs that need fixing
- Check out the source code and contribute

Thank you for using Next-Tools! Your support helps us continue building better developer tools. üöÄ
about.description: Learn about Next Tools - a collection of practical online tools for developers. Discover our mission, technologies, and how to contribute to this open-source project.

support.description: Next Tools is completely free and open source. If you find it helpful, consider supporting the development!

about.title: About - Next Tools

actions.reportBug: Report a bug or an issue
actions.reportBugDescription: Report a bug or an issue to help improve next-tools.
actions.toggleDarkModeDescription: Toggle dark mode on or off.

external.githubRepositoryDescription: View the source code of next-tools on Github.

analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our tools to improve your experience.
analytics.title: Analytics

ccpa.description: We respect your privacy rights under CCPA. You can control how we use your data for analytics and marketing.
ccpa.title: Privacy Preferences

customize.analyticsDescription: Allow analytics to help us improve our service
customize.marketingDescription: Allow personalized ads and marketing communications

default.description: Help us improve our service by allowing analytics cookies. You can change these settings anytime.
default.title: Privacy Preferences

essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.
essential.title: Essential

gdpr.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. Under GDPR, we need your consent to use analytics cookies.
gdpr.title: Cookie Preferences

categories.favoritesDndToolTip: Drag and drop to reorder favorites

home.description: Next-Tools is a collection of useful online tools for developers, with great UX.
home.subtitle: Handy tools for developers
home.title: Next-Tools - Handy online tools for developers

pwa.offlineReady: App is ready for offline use
pwa.updateDescription: A new version is ready. Click update to get the latest features.

ascii-text-drawer.description: Create ASCII art text with many fonts and styles.
ascii-text-drawer.title: ASCII art text generator

base-converter.description: Convert a number between different bases (decimal, hexadecimal, binary, octal, base64, ...)
base-converter.title: Integer base converter

base64-file-converter.description: Convert a string, file, or image into its base64 representation.
base64-file-converter.title: Base64 file converter

base64-string-converter.description: Simply encode and decode strings into their base64 representation.
base64-string-converter.title: Base64 string encoder/decoder

basic-auth-generator.description: Generate a base64 basic auth header from a username and password.
basic-auth-generator.title: Basic auth generator

bcrypt.description: Hash and compare text string using bcrypt. Bcrypt is a password-hashing function based on the Blowfish cipher.
bcrypt.title: Bcrypt

benchmark-builder.description: Easily compare execution time of tasks with this very simple online benchmark builder.
benchmark-builder.title: Benchmark builder

bip39-generator.description: Generate a BIP39 passphrase from an existing or random mnemonic, or get the mnemonic from the passphrase.
bip39-generator.title: BIP39 passphrase generator

camera-recorder.description: Take a picture or record a video from your webcam or camera.
camera-recorder.title: Camera recorder

case-converter.description: Transform the case of a string and choose between different formats
case-converter.title: Case converter

chmod-calculator.description: Compute your chmod permissions and commands with this online chmod calculator.
chmod-calculator.title: Chmod calculator

chronometer.description: Monitor the duration of a thing. Basically a chronometer with simple chronometer features.
chronometer.title: Chronometer

color-converter.description: Convert color between the different formats (hex, rgb, hsl and css name)
color-converter.title: Color converter

cron-generator.description: Validate and generate cron expressions and get the human-readable description of the cron schedule.
cron-generator.title: Cron Expression Generator

data-transfer-calculator.description: Calculate how long it takes to transfer data based on file size and transfer speed. Estimate download/upload times and plan network transfers.
data-transfer-calculator.title: Data Transfer Calculator

date-calculator.description: Perform date arithmetic, calculate time differences, and convert time units
date-calculator.title: Date Calculator

date-converter.description: Convert date and time into the various different formats
date-converter.title: Date-time converter

device-information.description: Get information about your current device (screen size, pixel-ratio, user agent, ...)
device-information.title: Device information

docker-run-to-docker-compose-converter.description: Transforms "docker run" commands into docker-compose files!
docker-run-to-docker-compose-converter.title: Docker run to Docker compose converter

email-normalizer.description: Normalize email addresses for comparison, deduplication and data cleaning.
email-normalizer.title: Email normalizer

emoji-picker.description: Copy and paste emojis easily and get the unicode and code points value of each emoji.
emoji-picker.title: Emoji picker

encryption.description: Encrypt clear text and decrypt ciphertext using crypto algorithms like AES, TripleDES, Rabbit or RC4.
encryption.title: Encrypt / decrypt text

eta-calculator.description: An ETA (Estimated Time of Arrival) calculator to determine the approximate end time of a task, for example, the end time and duration of a file download.
eta-calculator.title: ETA calculator

git-memo.description: Git is a decentralized version management software. With this cheatsheet, you will have quick access to the most common git commands.
git-memo.title: Git cheatsheet

hash-text.description: Hash a text string using the function you need : MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512, SHA384, SHA3 or RIPEMD160
hash-text.title: Hash text

hmac-generator.description: Computes a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) using a secret key and your favorite hashing function.
hmac-generator.title: Hmac generator

html-entities.description: Escape or unescape HTML entities (replace characters like <,>, &, " and \' with their HTML version)
html-entities.title: Escape HTML entities

html-wysiwyg-editor.description: Online, feature-rich WYSIWYG HTML editor which generates the source code of the content immediately.
html-wysiwyg-editor.title: HTML WYSIWYG editor

http-status-codes.description: The list of all HTTP status codes, their name, and their meaning.
http-status-codes.title: HTTP status codes

iban-validator-and-parser.description: Validate and parse IBAN numbers. Check if an IBAN is valid and get the country, BBAN, if it is a QR-IBAN and the IBAN friendly format.
iban-validator-and-parser.title: IBAN validator and parser

ico-generator.description: Generate ICO files from images. Convert PNG, JPEG, or other image formats to ICO files with multiple icon sizes for favicons and Windows applications.
ico-generator.title: ICO Generator

ipv4-address-converter.description: Convert an IP address into decimal, binary, hexadecimal, or even an IPv6 representation of it.
ipv4-address-converter.title: IPv4 address converter

ipv4-range-expander.description: Given a start and an end IPv4 address, this tool calculates a valid IPv4 subnet along with its CIDR notation.
ipv4-range-expander.title: IPv4 range expander

ipv4-subnet-calculator.description: Parse your IPv4 CIDR blocks and get all the info you need about your subnet.
ipv4-subnet-calculator.title: IPv4 subnet calculator

ipv6-ula-generator.description: Generate your own local, non-routable IP addresses for your network according to RFC4193.
ipv6-ula-generator.title: IPv6 ULA generator

json-diff.description: Compare two JSON objects and get the differences between them.
json-diff.title: JSON diff

json-minify.description: Minify and compress your JSON by removing unnecessary whitespace.
json-minify.title: JSON minify

json-prettify.description: Prettify your JSON string into a friendly, human-readable format.
json-prettify.title: JSON prettify and format

json-to-csv.description: Convert JSON to CSV with automatic header detection.
json-to-csv.title: JSON to CSV

json-to-toml.description: Parse and convert JSON to TOML.
json-to-toml.title: JSON to TOML

json-to-yaml.description: Simply convert JSON to YAML with this online live converter.
json-to-yaml.title: JSON to YAML

jwt-parser.description: Parse and decode your JSON Web Token (jwt) and display its content.
jwt-parser.title: JWT parser

keycode-info.description: Find the javascript keycode, code, location and modifiers of any pressed key.
keycode-info.title: Keycode info

list-converter.description: This tool can process column-based data and apply various changes (transpose, add prefix and suffix, reverse list, sort list, lowercase values, truncate values) to each row.
list-converter.title: List converter

lorem-ipsum-generator.description: Lorem ipsum is a placeholder text commonly used to demonstrate the visual form of a document or a typeface without relying on meaningful content
lorem-ipsum-generator.title: Lorem ipsum generator

mac-address-generator.description: Enter the quantity and prefix. MAC addresses will be generated in your chosen case (uppercase or lowercase)
mac-address-generator.title: MAC address generator

mac-address-lookup.description: Find the vendor and manufacturer of a device by its MAC address.
mac-address-lookup.title: MAC address lookup

markdown-to-html.description: Convert Markdown to HTML and print as PDF
markdown-to-html.title: Markdown to HTML

math-evaluator.description: A calculator for evaluating mathematical expressions. You can use functions like sqrt, cos, sin, abs, etc.
math-evaluator.title: Math evaluator

mime-types.description: Convert MIME types to file extensions and vice-versa.
mime-types.title: MIME types

numeronym-generator.description: A numeronym is a word where a number is used to form an abbreviation. For example, "i18n" is a numeronym of "internationalization" where 18 stands for the number of letters between the first i and the last n in the word.
numeronym-generator.title: Numeronym generator

og-meta-generator.description: Generate open-graph and socials HTML meta tags for your website.
og-meta-generator.title: Open graph meta generator

otp-generator.description: Generate and validate time-based OTP (one time password) for multi-factor authentication.
otp-generator.title: OTP code generator

password-strength-analyser.description: Discover the strength of your password with this client-side-only password strength analyser and crack time estimation tool.
password-strength-analyser.title: Password strength analyser

pdf-signature-checker.description: Verify the signatures of a PDF file. A signed PDF file contains one or more signatures that may be used to determine whether the contents of the file have been altered since the file was signed.
pdf-signature-checker.title: PDF signature checker

percentage-calculator.description: Easily calculate percentages from a value to another value, or from a percentage to a value.
percentage-calculator.title: Percentage calculator

phone-parser-and-formatter.description: Parse, validate and format phone numbers. Get information about the phone number, like the country code, type, etc.
phone-parser-and-formatter.title: Phone parser and formatter

qrcode-generator.description: Generate and download a QR code for a URL (or just plain text), and customize the background and foreground colors.
qrcode-generator.title: QR Code generator

random-port-generator.description: Generate random port numbers outside of the range of "known" ports (0-1023).
random-port-generator.title: Random port generator

regex-tester.description: Test your regular expressions with sample text.
regex-tester.title: Regex tester

roman-numeral-converter.description: Convert Roman numerals to numbers and convert numbers to Roman numerals.
roman-numeral-converter.title: Roman numeral converter

rsa-key-pair-generator.description: Generate a new random RSA private and public pem certificate key pair.
rsa-key-pair-generator.title: RSA key pair generator

slugify-string.description: Make a string url, filename and id safe.
slugify-string.title: Slugify string

sql-prettify.description: Format and prettify your SQL queries online (it supports various SQL dialects).
sql-prettify.keywords: sql,prettify,beautify,GCP BigQuery,IBM DB2,Apache Hive,MariaDB,MySQL,Couchbase N1QL,Oracle PL/SQL,PostgreSQL,Amazon Redshift,Spark,SQL Server Transact-SQL
sql-prettify.title: SQL prettify and format

string-obfuscator.description: Obfuscate a string (like a secret, an IBAN, or a token) to make it shareable and identifiable without revealing its content.
string-obfuscator.title: String obfuscator

svg-placeholder-generator.description: Generate svg images to use as a placeholder in your applications.
svg-placeholder-generator.title: SVG placeholder generator

temperature-converter.description: Degrees temperature conversions for Kelvin, Celsius, Fahrenheit, Rankine, Delisle, Newton, R√©aumur, and R√∏mer.
temperature-converter.title: Temperature converter

text-diff.description: Compare two texts and see the differences between them.
text-diff.title: Text diff

text-statistics.description: Get information about a text, the number of characters, the number of words, its size in bytes, ...
text-statistics.title: Text statistics

text-to-binary.description: Convert text to its ASCII binary representation and vice-versa.
text-to-binary.title: Text to ASCII binary

text-to-nato-alphabet.description: Transform text into the NATO phonetic alphabet for oral transmission.
text-to-nato-alphabet.title: Text to NATO alphabet

text-to-unicode.description: Parse and convert text to unicode and vice-versa
text-to-unicode.title: Text to Unicode

token-generator.description: Generate random string with the chars you want, uppercase or lowercase letters, numbers and/or symbols.
token-generator.title: Token generator

toml-to-json.description: Parse and convert TOML to JSON.
toml-to-json.title: TOML to JSON

toml-to-yaml.description: Parse and convert TOML to YAML.
toml-to-yaml.title: TOML to YAML

ulid-generator.description: Generate random Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifier (ULID).
ulid-generator.title: ULID generator

url-encoder.description: Encode text to URL-encoded format (also known as "percent-encoded"), or decode from it.
url-encoder.title: Encode/decode URL-formatted strings

url-parser.description: Parse a URL into its separate constituent parts (protocol, origin, params, port, username-password, ...)
url-parser.title: URL parser

user-agent-parser.description: Detect and parse Browser, Engine, OS, CPU, and Device type/model from an user-agent string.
user-agent-parser.title: User-agent parser

uuid-generator.description: A Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) is a 128-bit number used to identify information in computer systems. The number of possible UUIDs is 16^32, which is 2^128 or about 3.4x10^38 (which is a lot!).
uuid-generator.title: UUIDs generator

wifi-qrcode-generator.description: Generate and download QR codes for quick connections to WiFi networks.
wifi-qrcode-generator.title: WiFi QR Code generator

xml-formatter.description: Prettify your XML string into a friendly, human-readable format.
xml-formatter.title: XML formatter

yaml-prettify.description: Prettify your YAML string into a friendly, human-readable format.
yaml-prettify.title: YAML prettify and format

yaml-to-json.description: Simply convert YAML to JSON with this online live converter.
yaml-to-json.title: YAML to JSON

yaml-to-toml.description: Parse and convert YAML to TOML.
yaml-to-toml.title: YAML to TOML

display-tester.title: Display Tester
display-tester.description: Comprehensive display testing tool for detecting dead pixels, testing color accuracy, grayscale transitions, response time, and more. Supports solid colors, gradients, grid alignment, and various test patterns.
